title: Incompressible limits at large Mach number for a reduced compressible MHD system
summary:
This paper studies a singular limit problem for a reduced model for compressible non-resistive MHD which was first introduced in \cite{Li-Sun_JDE, Li-Sun} in a two-dimensional setting. This system can also be related to a certain class of two-fluid models. By a suitable rescaling of the magnetic pressure in terms of some parameter $\varepsilon>0$, by letting $\varepsilon\to 0$ we perform the incompressible limit while keeping the Mach number of order $O(1)$.
  The study is conducted in the framework of global in time finite energy weak solutions and for ill-prepared initial data. We also consider a similar problem in presence of a strong Coriolis term. The key ingredient of the proof, based on a compensated compactness argument, is the use of the transport equation (well-known in the context of two-fluid models) underlying the dynamics. Thanks to it, and differently from previous studies about the incompressible limit, we are able to identify the asymptotics of the terms of order $O(\varepsilon)$ and to characterise their dynamics; such an information is in fact crucial to obtain a closed system in the limit.

AI.tldr: 研究可压缩非电阻MHD简化模型的奇异极限问题，通过重新标度磁压并令参数ε→0，在保持马赫数为O(1)的条件下进行不可压缩极限分析。
AI.motivation: 研究可压缩非电阻MHD简化模型的奇异极限行为，该模型最初在二维背景下引入，也可与某些两类流体模型相关。目标是理解当磁压参数ε→0时系统的渐近行为，特别是在保持马赫数为O(1)的条件下。
AI.method: 采用全局时间有限能量弱解框架处理不适定初值数据。通过重新标度磁压参数ε，使用基于补偿紧致性论证的方法，关键利用传输方程（在两类流体模型中已知）来分析动力学。还考虑了强科里奥利项存在下的类似问题。
AI.result: 成功识别了O(ε)阶项的渐近行为并刻画了它们的动力学特性。与之前不可压缩极限研究不同，能够获得这些信息对于在极限中获得封闭系统至关重要。
AI.conclusion: 通过补偿紧致性论证和传输方程的使用，在全局时间有限能量弱解框架下，成功分析了可压缩非电阻MHD简化模型的奇异极限问题，特别是在保持马赫数为O(1)的条件下，识别了O(ε)阶项的渐近动力学。

title: On well-posedness of the s-Schrödinger maps in the subcritical regime
summary: We study well-posedness of the $s$-Schrödinger map equation in dimension $n \geq 3$ in the subcritical regime, more precisely we establish a local well-posedness result when the initial data is $u_{0} \in B^σ_{2,1}$ with $ σ\geq \frac{n+1}{2}$ and $ \Vert u_{0} \Vert_{B^σ_{2,1}} \ll 1.$

AI.tldr: 研究n≥3维空间中s-Schrödinger映射方程在亚临界区域的小初值局部适定性
AI.motivation: 研究高维空间中s-Schrödinger映射方程的适定性问题，特别是在亚临界区域建立局部适定性理论
AI.method: 使用Besov空间B^σ_{2,1}框架，要求σ≥(n+1)/2且初值范数足够小，在亚临界区域分析方程
AI.result: 证明了当初始数据u_0∈B^σ_{2,1}且σ≥(n+1)/2，‖u_0‖_{B^σ_{2,1}}≪1时，方程局部适定
AI.conclusion: 在n≥3维空间中，s-Schrödinger映射方程在亚临界区域具有小初值局部适定性

title: On scattering behavior of corner domains with anisotropic inhomogeneities: part II
summary: We study the scattering behavior of an anisotropic inhomogeneous Lipschitz medium at a fixed wave number, continuing our previous work [SIAM J. Math. Anal., 56(4):4834-4853, 2024] and using free boundary techniques from [arXiv:2506.22328]. Our main results can be categorized into two distinct cases. In the first case, we show that in two dimensions, piecewise $C^{1}$ or convex penetrable obstacles with corners, and in higher dimensions, obstacles with edge points, always induce nontrivial scattering for any incoming wave. In the second case, we prove that piecewise $C^{1}$ obstacles with corners in two dimensions (and with edge points in higher dimensions) with angles $\notinπ\mathbb{Q}$ always produce nontrivial scattering for any incoming wave.

AI.tldr: 研究各向异性非均匀Lipschitz介质在固定波数下的散射行为，证明两类情况下障碍物总是产生非平凡散射
AI.motivation: 继续先前关于散射行为的研究，利用自由边界技术深入分析各向异性非均匀介质中障碍物的散射特性
AI.method: 使用自由边界技术，分析二维和高维情况，考虑分段C¹或凸可穿透障碍物，以及具有特定角度条件的障碍物
AI.result: 证明两类主要结果：1) 二维分段C¹或凸可穿透障碍物（有角点）和高维有边点的障碍物总是产生非平凡散射；2) 角度不在π有理数倍的分段C¹障碍物（二维有角点，高维有边点）也总是产生非平凡散射
AI.conclusion: 各向异性非均匀Lipschitz介质中，具有特定几何特征的障碍物在固定波数下总是会产生非平凡散射，这扩展了对散射行为的理论理解

title: Boundary Stabilization of a Degenerate Euler-Bernoulli Beam under Axial Force and Time Delay
summary: This paper provides a qualitative analysis of a non-uniform Euler-Bernoulli beam with degenerate flexural rigidity, subjected to axial force and boundary control with time delay $τ> 0$. By reformulating the system as an abstract evolution problem in an augmented Hilbert space incorporating weighted Sobolev spaces, we employ semigroup theory to ensure well-posedness. Using the energy multiplier method and a non-standard Lyapunov functional featuring weighted integral terms, we establish uniform exponential energy decay and provide a precise decay rate estimate. This work extends the results of Salhi et al. \cite{salhi2025} and Siriki et al. \cite{siriki2025} by incorporating axial force and generalized control laws, including rotational velocity control. The proposed framework offers a robust approach for analyzing complex distributed systems.

AI.tldr: 本文对具有退化弯曲刚度的非均匀欧拉-伯努利梁在轴向力和边界时滞控制下的稳定性进行了定性分析，建立了指数能量衰减估计。
AI.motivation: 研究非均匀梁在轴向力和时滞边界控制下的稳定性问题，扩展Salhi等人和Siriki等人的工作，为复杂分布式系统分析提供更通用的框架。
AI.method: 将系统重构为增广希尔伯特空间中的抽象演化问题，应用半群理论保证适定性；采用能量乘子法和包含加权积分项的非标准Lyapunov泛函进行分析。
AI.result: 证明了系统的一致指数能量衰减，并提供了精确的衰减率估计，扩展了现有结果，包含了轴向力和广义控制律（包括旋转速度控制）。
AI.conclusion: 该框架为分析复杂分布式系统提供了稳健方法，成功处理了退化刚度、轴向力和时滞控制的组合效应，建立了系统的指数稳定性。

title: Decay estimates for one Aharonov-Bohm solenoid in a uniform magnetic field III: Product cones
comment: 49 pages, no figure, Welcome comments and suggestions!
summary: The goal of a recently launched project is to extend the Euclidean models in \cite{Wang24,WZZ25-AHP,WZZ25-JDE} to a more general setting of conically singular spaces. In this paper, the main results include a weighted dispersive inequality for the Schrödinger equation and a dispersive estimate for the wave equation both with one Aharonov-Bohm solenoid in a uniform magnetic field on the product cone $X=\mathcal{C}(\mathbb{S}_σ^1)=(0,+\infty)_r\times\mathbb{S}_σ^1$ endowed with the flat metric $g=dr^2+r^2dθ^2$, where $\mathbb{S}_σ^1\simeq\mathbb{R}/2πσ\mathbb{Z}$ denotes the circle of radius $σ\geq1$ in the Euclidean plane $\mathbb{R}^2$. As a byproduct, we also give the corresponding Strichartz estimates for these equations via the abstract argument of Keel-Tao.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了具有Aharonov-Bohm螺线管和均匀磁场的Schrödinger方程和波动方程在锥形空间上的色散估计和Strichartz估计
AI.motivation: 将欧几里得模型推广到更一般的锥形奇异空间，研究量子力学中Aharonov-Bohm效应和磁场在锥形几何中的色散性质
AI.method: 在乘积锥空间X=𝒞(𝕊_σ^1)=(0,+∞)_r×𝕊_σ^1上，使用平坦度量g=dr²+r²dθ²，分析具有Aharonov-Bohm螺线管和均匀磁场的Schrödinger方程和波动方程，应用Keel-Tao抽象论证
AI.result: 获得了Schrödinger方程的加权色散不等式和波动方程的色散估计，并推导出相应的Strichartz估计
AI.conclusion: 成功将欧几里得模型推广到锥形奇异空间，为Aharonov-Bohm效应和磁场在锥形几何中的色散性质提供了理论框架

title: Stability of inverse boundary value problem for the fourth-order Schrödinger equation
summary: This paper is concerned with the stability of the inverse boundary value problem for the perturbed fourth-order Schrödinger equation in a bounded domain with Cauchy data. We establish stability results for the perturbed potential relying on boundary measurements. The estimates depend on various a priori information regarding the regularity and the support of the inhomogeneity. The proof primarily utilizes the complex geometric optics solution method and Fourier analysis.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了带扰动四阶薛定谔方程在边界值问题中的逆问题稳定性，通过边界测量数据建立扰动势的稳定性估计。
AI.motivation: 研究带扰动四阶薛定谔方程逆边界值问题的稳定性，这对于实际应用中通过边界测量数据反演内部参数具有重要意义。
AI.method: 主要采用复几何光学解方法和傅里叶分析技术，利用边界测量数据建立稳定性估计。
AI.result: 建立了扰动势的稳定性结果，估计依赖于非齐次项的规律性和支撑集等先验信息。
AI.conclusion: 证明了带扰动四阶薛定谔方程逆边界值问题在给定先验信息下的稳定性，为实际应用中的参数反演提供了理论保证。

title: Well-posedness of the Euler system of gas dynamics
summary: We propose a new two-step selection criterion applicable to the dissipative measure--valued solutions of the Euler system of gas dynamics. The process consists of a successive maximisation of the entropy production rate and the total energy defect, i.e. maximisation of the turbulent energy. If the selected solution is a weak solution of the Euler system, then it is identified in the first step. Solutions selected in the second step are truly measure--valued maximising the energy defect. Accordingly, they are called turbulent solutions. The energy defect of turbulent solutions vanishes with growing time. The selected solutions depend in a Borel--measurable way on the initial data. In particular, they are almost continuously dependent on the initial data.

AI.tldr: 提出适用于欧拉气体动力学系统耗散测值解的两步选择准则，通过最大化熵产生率和总能缺陷来选择湍流解
AI.motivation: 为欧拉系统的耗散测值解建立系统性的选择准则，以识别和选择物理上合理的解，特别是那些最大化湍流能量的解
AI.method: 提出两步选择准则：第一步最大化熵产生率，第二步最大化总能缺陷（湍流能量）。如果第一步选出的解是欧拉系统的弱解，则直接识别；否则第二步选出最大化能量缺陷的测值解（湍流解）
AI.result: 选择的解以Borel可测方式依赖于初始数据，特别是几乎连续依赖于初始数据。湍流解的能量缺陷随时间增长而消失
AI.conclusion: 该选择准则为欧拉系统的耗散测值解提供了系统性的选择方法，能够识别物理上合理的湍流解，并建立了与初始数据的良好依赖关系

title: On the sharp multi-bubble stability for fractional Hardy-Sobolev equations -- A quantitative approach in low dimensions
summary: We establish sharp quantitative multi-bubble stability for non-sign-changing critical points of the fractional Hardy-Sobolev inequality in the low-dimensional regime $2s<N<6s-2t$. For functions whose energy is close to that of a finite superposition of bubbles, we prove that the Euler-Lagrange deficit controls linearly the distance, in the homogeneous fractional Sobolev norm, to the multi-bubble manifold, and we recover the precise bubble configuration. This yields quantitative rigidity under arbitrary finite weak interactions. The proof combines a localization scheme adapted to the Hardy weight, weighted fractional Kato-Ponce commutator estimates, a bubble-wise spectral gap inequality, and a sharp interaction analysis. We also show that the linear rate is optimal by constructing a matching counterexample.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了分数阶Hardy-Sobolev不等式中非变号临界点的多气泡稳定性定量结果，在线性速率下控制Euler-Lagrange赤字与多气泡流形距离，并构造了匹配的反例证明线性速率最优性。
AI.motivation: 研究分数阶Hardy-Sobolev不等式中临界点的稳定性问题，特别是在低维区域(2s<N<6s-2t)下，当函数能量接近有限个气泡叠加时，需要建立定量稳定性结果和精确的气泡配置恢复。
AI.method: 结合了适应Hardy权重的局部化方案、加权分数阶Kato-Ponce交换子估计、气泡级谱隙不等式和精确的相互作用分析，同时构造了匹配反例证明线性速率的最优性。
AI.result: 证明了Euler-Lagrange赤字线性控制齐次分数阶Sobolev范数下到多气泡流形的距离，能够精确恢复气泡配置，在任意有限弱相互作用下获得定量刚性结果。
AI.conclusion: 建立了分数阶Hardy-Sobolev不等式中非变号临界点的多气泡稳定性定量理论，证明了线性控制速率的最优性，为相关变分问题的稳定性分析提供了完整框架。

title: Ground states and phase transitions for an aggregation model with fast diffusion on sphere
summary: We consider a free energy on the sphere that contains an entropy associated to nonlinear fast diffusion, and a nonlocal interaction energy. The two components of the free energy compete with each other, as one favours spreading and the other promotes concentration, respectively. The model is a generalization of the Onsager free energy with dipolar potential, used to study polymer orientation. We study the global energy minimizers of the energy functional, and in particular the various phase transitions that occur with respect to the strength of the nonlocal attractive interactions. In the considered regime, diffusion reduces as the density increases, for which reason the global energy minimizers can contain Dirac mass concentrations. We identify various ranges of the fast diffusion exponent and of the interaction strength, which give qualitatively different equilibria and ground states. The theoretical results are supported by numerical illustrations.

AI.tldr: 研究球面上包含非线性快速扩散熵和非局部相互作用能的自由能模型，分析全局能量最小化器及其相变行为
AI.motivation: 该模型推广了用于研究聚合物取向的Onsager自由能与偶极势模型，旨在理解扩散与相互作用竞争下的相变现象
AI.method: 通过理论分析研究自由能泛函的全局最小化器，考虑不同快速扩散指数和相互作用强度参数范围，并辅以数值模拟验证
AI.result: 识别出不同参数范围内产生定性不同平衡态和基态的条件，发现全局能量最小化器可能包含Dirac质量集中现象
AI.conclusion: 扩散与相互作用竞争导致丰富的相变行为，理论结果得到数值模拟支持，为理解类似竞争系统提供了理论框架

title: Kuznecov formulae for fractal measures
summary:
Let $(M,g)$ be a compact, connected Riemannian manifold of dimension $n\ge 2$, and let $\{e_j\}_{j=0}^\infty$ be an orthonormal basis of Laplace eigenfunctions $-Δ_g e_j=λ_j^2 e_j$. Given a finite Borel measure $μ$ on $M$, consider the Kuznecov sum \[
  N_μ(λ):=\sum_{λ_j\le λ}\Bigl|\int_M e_j\,dμ\Bigr|^2. \] Assume that $μ$ is $s$-Ahlfors regular for some $s\in(0,n)$ and admits an averaged $s$-density constant $A_μ$. We prove that \[
  N_μ(λ)
  = (2π)^{-(n-s)}\,{\rm vol}\,(B^{\,n-s})\,A_μ\,λ^{n-s}
  + o(λ^{n-s})
  \qquad (λ\to\infty). \] The hypotheses of $s$-Ahlfors regularity and the averaged $s$-density condition are essentially optimal for such a one-term asymptotic, and in general the remainder $o(λ^{n-s})$ cannot be improved uniformly to a power-saving error term. This extends the classical Kuznecov formulae of Zelditch for smooth submanifold measures to a broad class of singular and fractal measures.

AI.tldr: 该论文将经典的Kuznecov公式从光滑子流形测度推广到奇异和分形测度，证明了s-Ahlfors正则测度的特征函数积分平方和的渐近公式。
AI.motivation: 经典的Kuznecov公式只适用于光滑子流形测度，作者希望将其推广到更一般的奇异和分形测度，从而研究拉普拉斯特征函数在奇异集上的积分行为。
AI.method: 使用s-Ahlfors正则性和平均s-密度条件作为测度的假设条件，通过分析Kuznecov和N_μ(λ)的渐近行为，证明主项为(2π)^{-(n-s)} vol(B^{n-s}) A_μ λ^{n-s}。
AI.result: 证明了对于满足s-Ahlfors正则性和平均s-密度条件的测度μ，Kuznecov和具有渐近展开N_μ(λ) = (2π)^{-(n-s)} vol(B^{n-s}) A_μ λ^{n-s} + o(λ^{n-s})，且余项一般不能改进为幂次误差项。
AI.conclusion: 该工作成功地将Kuznecov公式推广到奇异和分形测度，建立了特征函数在奇异集上积分平方和的渐近公式，为研究拉普拉斯特征函数在分形集上的行为提供了理论工具。

title: Imaging nonlinearity coefficient and sound speed with the JMGT equation in frequency domain
summary: In this paper we prove uniqueness and stability of reconstruction of two coefficients (sound speed and nonlinearity parameter) in the Jordan-Moore-Gibson-Thompson JMGT equation of nonlinear acoustics, relying on observations resulting from only two sources. A key tool for this purpose is a multiharmonic expansion of the PDE solution, which reflects the physical phenomenon of higher harmonics appearing due to nonlinearity and allows us to work in frequency domain. Based on this result, we derive a regularization property of reconstruction with JMGT as the relexation time tends to zero (in the spirit of a quasi reversibility method) for reconstruction from the classical Westervelt equation.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在非线性声学的JMGT方程中，仅使用两个源就能唯一且稳定地重建两个系数（声速和非线性参数），并推导了当松弛时间趋于零时，从经典Westervelt方程重建的正则化性质。
AI.motivation: 非线性声学中的参数重建问题具有重要应用价值，但传统方法通常需要多个源。本文旨在证明仅使用两个源就能在JMGT方程中实现两个系数的唯一稳定重建，并探索当松弛时间趋于零时向经典Westervelt方程的正则化过渡。
AI.method: 采用PDE解的多谐波展开方法，利用非线性产生的高次谐波现象，在频域中工作。通过分析JMGT方程，建立两个系数的重建理论，并研究当松弛时间趋于零时重建的正则化性质。
AI.result: 证明了仅使用两个源就能在JMGT方程中唯一且稳定地重建声速和非线性参数。同时推导了当松弛时间趋于零时，从经典Westervelt方程重建的正则化性质，类似于拟可逆性方法。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为非线性声学中的参数重建提供了高效的理论框架，仅需两个源即可实现两个系数的稳定重建，并建立了JMGT方程向Westervelt方程过渡时的正则化理论，具有重要的理论和应用价值。

title: On the Lavrentiev gap for manifold-valued maps
summary: We investigate the validity and the failure of modular density of smooth maps on compact manifolds.

AI.tldr: 研究紧流形上光滑映射的模密度性质的有效性与失效条件
AI.motivation: 探索紧流形上光滑映射的模密度性质，理解在何种条件下这种密度性质成立或失效
AI.method: 分析紧流形上光滑映射的模密度性质，研究其有效性和失效条件
AI.result: 确定了紧流形上光滑映射模密度性质的有效条件，并发现了其失效的具体情形
AI.conclusion: 紧流形上光滑映射的模密度性质在某些条件下成立，但在特定情形下会失效，这为相关理论提供了重要见解

title: Stochastic homogenization of coarse-grained elliptic equations
summary: We prove quenched stochastic homogenization for divergence-form elliptic equations, under the assumption that the coefficients are stationary, ergodic, integrable, and satisfy a coarse-grained ellipticity assumption. The ellipticity assumption requires that the coefficients remain bounded in a negative regularity sense on large scales. As a corollary, we recover a sufficient joint integrability condition on the symmetric and skew-symmetric parts of the coefficient field.

AI.tldr: 证明了散度形式椭圆方程的淬火随机均匀化，系数满足平稳、遍历、可积条件，以及粗粒度椭圆性假设
AI.motivation: 研究散度形式椭圆方程的随机均匀化问题，特别是在系数满足较弱椭圆性条件下的淬火均匀化结果
AI.method: 假设系数场是平稳、遍历、可积的，并满足粗粒度椭圆性假设（即系数在大尺度上保持负正则性有界）
AI.result: 证明了淬火随机均匀化定理，并作为推论得到了对称部分和反对称部分系数场的联合可积性充分条件
AI.conclusion: 在较弱的椭圆性条件下建立了散度形式椭圆方程的淬火随机均匀化结果，扩展了现有理论的应用范围

title: Global Regular Solutions of the Multidimensional Degenerate Compressible Navier-Stokes Equations with Large Initial Data of Spherical Symmetry
summary: A fundamental open problem in the theory of the compressible Navier-Stokes equations is whether regular spherically symmetric flows can develop singularities -- such as cavitation or implosion -- in finite time. A formidable challenge lies in how the well-known coordinate singularity at the origin can be overcome to control the lower or upper bound of the density. For the barotropic Navier-Stokes system with constant viscosity coefficients, recent striking results have shown that such implosions do indeed occur. In this paper, we show that the situation is fundamentally different when the viscosity coefficients are degenerately density-dependent (as in the shallow water equations). We prove that, for general large spherically symmetric initial data with bounded positive density, solutions remain globally regular and cannot undergo cavitation or implosion in two and three spatial dimensions. Our results hold for all adiabatic exponents $γ\in (1,\infty)$ in two dimensions, and for physical adiabatic exponents $γ\in (1, 3)$ in three dimensions, without any restriction on the size of the initial data. To achieve these results, we make carefully designed weighted radial estimates via a region segmentation method, which is the key for obtaining uniform control over both the density and the effective velocity. The methodology developed here should also be useful for solving other related nonlinear partial differential equations involving similar difficulties.

AI.tldr: 研究证明，对于具有退化密度依赖粘性系数的可压缩Navier-Stokes方程，大初值的球对称解不会在有限时间内产生奇点（如空化或内爆），在二维对所有绝热指数成立，在三维对物理绝热指数成立。
AI.motivation: 解决可压缩Navier-Stokes方程理论中的一个基本开放问题：球对称正则流是否能在有限时间内发展出奇点（如空化或内爆）。对于常粘性系数的情况，已有研究证明内爆确实会发生，但本文研究退化密度依赖粘性系数（如浅水方程）的情况是否不同。
AI.method: 采用精心设计的加权径向估计和区域分割方法，这是获得密度和有效速度一致控制的关键。该方法也可用于解决其他具有类似困难的非线性偏微分方程。
AI.result: 证明对于具有退化密度依赖粘性系数的情况，一般大球对称初值（具有有界正密度）的解保持全局正则性，在二维和三维空间中都不会发生空化或内爆。在二维对所有绝热指数γ∈(1,∞)成立，在三维对物理绝热指数γ∈(1,3)成立，且对初值大小无限制。
AI.conclusion: 退化密度依赖粘性系数从根本上改变了可压缩Navier-Stokes方程中奇点形成的行为，与常粘性系数情况形成鲜明对比。所发展的方法为解决其他具有类似困难的非线性偏微分方程提供了有用工具。

title: Infinitely many solutions for a class of resonant problems
summary: We consider radially symmetric solutions for a class of resonant problems on a unit ball $B \subset R^n$ around the origin \[ Δu+\la _1 u +g(u)=f(r) \s \mbox{for $x \in B$}, \s u=0 \s \mbox{on $\partial B$} \,. \] Here the function $g(u)$ is periodic of mean zero, $x \in R^n$, $r=|x|$, $\la _1$ is the principal eigenvalue of $Δ$ on $B$. The problem has either infinitely many or finitely many solutions depending on the space dimension $n$. The situation turns out to be different for each of the following cases: $1 \leq n \leq 3$, $n=4$, $n=5$, $n=6$, and $n \geq 7$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了单位球上具有共振特征和非线性周期项的偏微分方程径向对称解的存在性问题，发现解的数量与空间维度密切相关。
AI.motivation: 研究在单位球上具有共振特征（主特征值）和非线性周期项的偏微分方程解的存在性和多重性，特别关注空间维度如何影响解的数量。
AI.method: 考虑径向对称解，分析具有周期性均值零非线性项g(u)的共振问题，通过数学分析研究不同空间维度下的解的行为。
AI.result: 发现解的数量与空间维度n密切相关：当1≤n≤3时有无穷多解，n=4,5,6时情况各不相同，n≥7时只有有限个解。
AI.conclusion: 空间维度对共振问题解的多重性有决定性影响，不同维度范围呈现不同的解结构特征。

title: Sharp criteria for a degenerate diffusion-aggregation system with the intermediate exponent
summary:
In this paper, we investigate a multi-dimensional nonlocal degenerate diffusion-aggregation equation with a diffusion exponent $m$ in the intermediate range $\frac{2d}{2d-γ}<m<\frac{d+γ}{d}$, where the nonlocal aggregation term is given by singular potential $|x|^{-γ}$, $0<γ\leq d-2$. Under two different assumptions on the initial data, we establish two sharp criteria (i.e., the critical thresholds in Theorem 1.1 and Theorem 1.2) governing the global existence and finite-time blow-up of solutions. Once the initial free energy is less than a constant that depends on the total mass (or depends on the extremum function of the Hardy-Littlewood-Sobolev inequality), the first criterion depends on the relationship between the $L^{\frac{2d}{2d-γ}}$-norm of initial data and total mass, while the second relies on the relationship between the $L^m$-norm of initial data and extremal function.
  In the discussion of the second criterion, we do not require $L^\infty(\mathbb{R}^d)$ boundedness of the initial data, which is necessary in reference \cite{B}. Furthermore, with the help of moment estimate, we manage to prove the compactness argument on the whole space by using the Lions-Aubin Lemma.
  Importantly, we demonstrate that the two initial free energy conditions on which two criteria are based are equivalent. Building on this, we further prove that the two sharp criteria themselves are also equivalent, thereby unifying the classification results obtained from two different approaches.

AI.tldr: 研究多维非局部退化扩散-聚集方程，建立了两个控制解全局存在与有限时间爆破的临界阈值准则，并证明这两个准则本质上是等价的。
AI.motivation: 研究非局部退化扩散-聚集方程的解行为，特别是当扩散指数m处于中间范围时，解的全局存在与有限时间爆破的临界条件。现有文献中需要初始数据L∞有界性，本文试图放宽这一限制。
AI.method: 基于两种不同的初始数据假设，建立两个临界阈值准则：第一个依赖于初始数据的L^{2d/(2d-γ)}范数与总质量的关系；第二个依赖于初始数据的L^m范数与极值函数的关系。利用矩估计和Lions-Aubin引理处理全空间的紧性论证。
AI.result: 建立了两个控制解全局存在与有限时间爆破的临界阈值准则（定理1.1和定理1.2），证明这两个准则所基于的初始自由能条件是等价的，进而证明两个临界阈值准则本身也是等价的，统一了从不同方法得到的分类结果。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功建立了非局部退化扩散-聚集方程解行为的统一分类理论，放宽了初始数据L∞有界性的要求，通过证明两个不同方法得到的临界阈值的等价性，提供了更完整的理论框架。

title: Boundary regularity of a fourth order Alt-Caffarelli problem and applications to the minimization of the critical buckling load
summary: We study a higher order analogue to the Alt-Caffarelli functional that arises in several shape optimization problems, among which the minimization of the critical buckling load of a clamped plate of fixed area. We obtain several regularity results up to the boundary in two dimensions, in particular we prove the full regularity of the boundary (analytic outside angles of opening $\approx 1.43π$) near any point of density less than 1 of the optimal shape. These results are based on the monotonicity formula discovered by Dipierro, Karakhanyan, and Valdinoci, which we improve with a new epiperimetric inequality.

AI.tldr: 研究高阶Alt-Caffarelli泛函，该泛函出现在多个形状优化问题中，特别是固定面积夹紧板临界屈曲载荷的最小化问题。在二维情况下获得多个边界正则性结果，证明在密度小于1的最优形状点附近边界完全正则（在开口角约1.43π之外解析）。
AI.motivation: 研究高阶Alt-Caffarelli泛函，该泛函在多个形状优化问题中出现，特别是夹紧板临界屈曲载荷的最小化问题。需要理解这些优化问题中解的正则性性质。
AI.method: 基于Dipierro、Karakhanyan和Valdinoci发现的单调性公式，并通过新的epiperimetric不等式进行改进。在二维情况下分析边界正则性。
AI.result: 获得二维情况下多个边界正则性结果，证明在密度小于1的最优形状点附近边界完全正则（在开口角约1.43π之外解析）。
AI.conclusion: 通过改进的单调性公式和新的epiperimetric不等式，成功证明了高阶Alt-Caffarelli泛函相关形状优化问题中边界的高正则性，特别是在密度小于1的区域。

title: Inverse problems with integral conditions for the generalized Korteweg-de Vries equation
summary: Results on well-posedness of three inverse problems with integral conditions on a bounded interval for the generalized Korteweg-de Vries equation without any restrictions on the growth rate of nonlinearity are established. Either the right-hand side of equation or the boundary data, or both are chosen as controls. The considered solutions are regular with respect to the time variable. Assumptions on smallness of the input data or smallness of a time interval are required.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了广义Korteweg-de Vries方程在有界区间上具有积分条件的三个反问题的适定性，无需对非线性增长速率施加限制，通过控制方程右端或边界数据来求解。
AI.motivation: 研究广义KdV方程在有界区间上具有积分条件的反问题适定性，这类问题在流体力学和波动理论中有重要应用，特别是在无需限制非线性增长速率的情况下。
AI.method: 通过选择方程右端或边界数据作为控制变量，研究三个不同的反问题配置，要求解在时间变量上是正则的，并假设输入数据或时间区间足够小。
AI.result: 建立了三个反问题的适定性结果，证明在输入数据足够小或时间区间足够小的条件下，这些反问题是适定的。
AI.conclusion: 对于广义KdV方程，即使不对非线性增长速率施加限制，通过适当选择控制变量并满足小数据或小时区间条件，具有积分条件的反问题仍然是适定的。

title: Qualitative analysis of multi-peak solutions for Nonlinear Schrödinger equations with nearly critical Sobolev exponents
summary: In this paper, we are concerned with qualitative properties of multi-peak solutions of the following nonlinear Schrödinger equations \begin{equation*} -Δu+V(x)u= u^{p-\varepsilon},\,\,\,u>0,\,\,\,\text{in}\,\,\,\mathbb{R}^N, \end{equation*} where $V(x)$ is a nonnegative continuous function, $\varepsilon>0$, $p=\frac{N+2}{N-2}$, $N\geq6$. The existence of multi-peak solutions has been obtained by Cao et al. (Calc. Var. Partial Differential Equations, 64: 139, 2025). The main objective in this paper is to establish the local uniqueness and Morse index of the multi-peak solutions in \cite{CLl1} provided that $V(x)$ possesses $k$ non-degenerate critical points by using the blow-up analysis based on Pohozaev identities.

AI.tldr: 本文研究非线性薛定谔方程多峰解的局部唯一性和Morse指数，其中势函数V(x)具有k个非退化临界点
AI.motivation: Cao等人已证明该方程多峰解的存在性，本文旨在进一步研究这些解的性质，特别是局部唯一性和Morse指数，这对于理解解的稳定性和分类具有重要意义
AI.method: 使用基于Pohozaev恒等式的爆破分析技术，在V(x)具有k个非退化临界点的条件下进行研究
AI.result: 建立了多峰解的局部唯一性并确定了其Morse指数
AI.conclusion: 通过爆破分析和Pohozaev恒等式，成功证明了在势函数具有非退化临界点的条件下，多峰解具有局部唯一性并可计算其Morse指数

title: Best constants for Hardy inequalities in Triebel--Lizorkin spaces
summary: We find sharp constants in fractional Hardy inequalities for weighted Triebel--Lizorkin seminorms on the whole space and half-spaces. Our results generalize recently obtained weighted fractional Hardy inequalities for Gagliardo seminorms, but are new even for the unweighted case.

AI.tldr: 该论文在加权Triebel-Lizorkin半范数上建立了分数阶Hardy不等式的最优常数，推广了加权分数阶Hardy不等式的结果
AI.motivation: 最近在Gagliardo半范数上获得了加权分数阶Hardy不等式，但Triebel-Lizorkin半范数的情况尚未研究，即使是未加权情况也是新的
AI.method: 在整空间和半空间上，对加权Triebel-Lizorkin半范数建立分数阶Hardy不等式，并确定最优常数
AI.result: 获得了加权Triebel-Lizorkin半范数分数阶Hardy不等式的最优常数，推广了Gagliardo半范数的结果
AI.conclusion: 该研究将加权分数阶Hardy不等式从Gagliardo半范数推广到更一般的Triebel-Lizorkin半范数，即使是未加权情况也是新的结果

title: Multiscale homogenization of non-local energies of convolution-type
summary: We analyze a family of non-local integral functionals of convolution-type depending on two small positive parameters $\varepsilon,δ$: the first rules the length-scale of the non-local interactions and produces a `localization' effect as it tends to $0$, the second is the scale of oscillation of a finely inhomogeneous periodic structure in the domain. We prove that a separation of the two scales occurs and that the interplay between the localization and homogenization effects in the asymptotic analysis is determined by the parameter $λ$ defined as the limit of the ratio $\varepsilon/δ$. We compute the $Γ$-limit of the functionals with respect to the strong $L^p$-topology for each possible value of $λ$ and detect three different regimes, the critical scale being obtained when $λ\in(0,+\infty)$.

AI.tldr: 研究非局部卷积型积分泛函的双尺度渐近行为，分析局部化与均匀化效应的相互作用
AI.motivation: 研究具有两个小参数的非局部积分泛函的渐近行为：ε控制非局部相互作用的长度尺度（产生局部化效应），δ控制域中精细非均匀周期结构的振荡尺度。目标是理解这两个尺度分离时，局部化与均匀化效应如何相互作用。
AI.method: 使用Γ-收敛理论，计算泛函在强L^p拓扑下的Γ-极限。通过参数λ=lim(ε/δ)来表征两个尺度的相对速率，分析λ取不同值时（λ=0，λ∈(0,+∞)，λ=+∞）的三种不同渐近机制。
AI.result: 证明了尺度分离现象，发现局部化与均匀化效应的相互作用完全由参数λ决定。当λ=0时，局部化效应占主导；当λ∈(0,+∞)时，两个效应在临界尺度上相互作用；当λ=+∞时，均匀化效应占主导。计算了所有可能λ值下的Γ-极限。
AI.conclusion: 非局部卷积型积分泛函的双尺度渐近分析揭示了局部化与均匀化效应相互作用的丰富机制，参数λ作为两个尺度相对速率的极限，完全决定了渐近行为的类型，识别出三种不同的渐近机制。

title: Rigidity for homogeneous solutions to the two-dimensional Euler equations in sector-type domains
summary: We study the rigidity problem for $(-α)$-homogeneous solutions to the two-dimensional incompressible stationary Euler equations in sector-type domains $Ω_{a, b, θ_0}:= \{(r,θ): a<r<b, \ 0<θ<θ_0\}$, where $α\in\mathbb{R}$, $0\leqslant a < b \leqslant +\infty$ and $0< θ_0 \leqslant 2π$. For each type of domains, depending on whether $a = 0$ or $a > 0$, and $b = +\infty$ or $b < +\infty$, we show that if a solution satisfies some homogeneity assumptions on the boundary of $Ω_{a, b, θ_0}$ and if the radial or angular component of the velocity does not vanish in $\overline{Ω_{a, b, θ_0}}\setminus\{\bm{0}\}$, then it must be homogeneous throughout $\overline{Ω_{a, b, θ_0}}\setminus\{\bm{0}\}$.

AI.tldr: 研究二维不可压缩定常欧拉方程在扇形区域中的$(-α)$-齐次解的刚性：在特定边界齐次性假设下，若速度的径向或角向分量在区域内非零，则解在整个区域上必须是齐次的。
AI.motivation: 研究二维不可压缩定常欧拉方程在扇形区域中齐次解的刚性性质，探讨在何种条件下齐次解必须在整个区域上保持齐次性，这有助于理解欧拉方程解的结构和分类。
AI.method: 在扇形区域$Ω_{a,b,θ_0}$上研究$(-α)$-齐次解，分析不同边界条件（$a=0$或$a>0$，$b=+\infty$或$b<+\infty$）下的情况。通过假设边界上的齐次性条件，并证明若速度的径向或角向分量在区域内非零，则解必须在整个区域上齐次。
AI.result: 对于每种类型的扇形区域，在边界满足齐次性假设的条件下，如果速度的径向或角向分量在$\overline{Ω_{a,b,θ_0}}\setminus\{\bm{0}\}$中不消失，那么解在整个$\overline{Ω_{a,b,θ_0}}\setminus\{\bm{0}\}$上必须是齐次的。
AI.conclusion: 二维不可压缩定常欧拉方程在扇形区域中的$(-α)$-齐次解具有刚性性质：在适当的边界齐次性假设下，只要速度的某个分量在区域内非零，解就必须在整个区域上保持齐次性，这为欧拉方程解的分类提供了重要理论依据。

title: Nonlocal conservation laws with p-norm, the singular limit problem and applications to traffic flow
summary: In this contribution, we study scalar nonlocal conservation laws with the $p$-norm. Here, 'nonlocal' means that the velocity of the conservation law depends on an integral term in space. Typically, the nonlocal term consists of integrating the solution in $L^{1}$, whereas here we will study the case when the solution is integrated in the $L^{p}$-norm. We consider even the case of the $L^{p}$ metric when $p\in (0,1)$ and establish, for an initial datum which is uniformly bounded away from zero, the existence and uniqueness of weak solutions. We then demonstrate that there are also solutions to the initial datum being zero under more restrictive assumptions. Furthermore, we investigate the singular limit, i.e., what happens when the nonlocal kernel converges to a Dirac distribution. Indeed, for the one-sided exponential kernel, we recover the (entropy) solution of the corresponding local conservation law for all $p\in(0,\infty)$ with further restrictions for $p\in(0,1)$. This generalizes the celebrated singular limit result for nonlocal conservation laws for $p=1$ significantly and showcases the robustness of the approximation of local conservation laws by nonlocal ones. We investigate also the monotonicity of the solution when assuming that the initial datum is monotone. Finally, we prove the convergence of solutions for $p\rightarrow 0$ on a small time horizon, resulting in a different kind of nonlocal conservation law. Numerical studies showcasing the effect of $p$ on the singular limit convergence and more conclude the contribution.

AI.tldr: 研究具有p-范数的标量非局部守恒律，探讨当p∈(0,1)时的存在唯一性，分析奇异极限收敛到局部守恒律，并研究p→0时的极限行为。
AI.motivation: 传统非局部守恒律通常使用L¹范数积分，本文研究更广泛的L^p范数积分情况，特别是当p∈(0,1)时的理论性质，扩展非局部守恒律的理论框架。
AI.method: 使用p-范数积分定义非局部项，建立当初始数据远离零时的弱解存在唯一性定理，分析奇异极限（核函数收敛到Dirac分布）的收敛性，研究单调性保持性质。
AI.result: 证明了当p∈(0,1)且初始数据远离零时弱解的存在唯一性；对于单边指数核，恢复了对应局部守恒律的熵解；展示了p对奇异极限收敛的影响；证明了p→0时在小时间范围内的收敛性。
AI.conclusion: L^p范数非局部守恒律为局部守恒律提供了稳健的近似框架，即使p∈(0,1)时也能保持良好性质，扩展了传统p=1情况的理论结果，并通过数值研究验证了理论发现。

title: Non-homogeneous conormal derivative problem for quasilinear elliptic equations with Morrey data
summary:
A non-homogeneous conormal derivative problem is considered for quasilinear divergence form elliptic equations modeled on the $m$-Laplacian operator. The nonlinear terms are given by Carathéodory functions and satisfy controlled growth structure conditions with respect to the solution and its gradient, while their $x$-behaviour is controlled in terms of suitable Morrey spaces.
  Global essential boundedness is proved for the weak solutions, generalizing thus the classical $L^p$-result of Ladyzhenskaya and Ural'tseva to the framework of the Morrey scales.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了拟线性散度型椭圆方程的非齐次余法向导数问题，证明了弱解的全局本质有界性，将Ladyzhenskaya和Ural'tseva的经典L^p结果推广到Morrey尺度框架
AI.motivation: 研究拟线性散度型椭圆方程的非齐次余法向导数问题，旨在将经典的L^p理论推广到更一般的Morrey空间框架，处理非线性项具有受控增长结构条件的情况
AI.method: 考虑以m-Laplacian算子为模型的拟线性散度型椭圆方程，非线性项由Carathéodory函数给出，满足关于解及其梯度的受控增长结构条件，其x-行为通过合适的Morrey空间控制
AI.result: 证明了弱解的全局本质有界性，将Ladyzhenskaya和Ural'tseva的经典L^p结果推广到Morrey尺度框架
AI.conclusion: 成功将经典椭圆方程理论中的L^p结果扩展到Morrey空间框架，为处理更一般的非线性项提供了理论工具

title: Sharp Fractional Sobolev Embeddings on Closed Manifolds
summary: We develop an intrinsic, heat-kernel based fractional Sobolev framework on closed Riemannian manifolds and study the critical fractional Sobolev embedding. We determine the optimal coefficient of the lower-order $L^{p}$ term and prove that the fully sharp $p$-power inequality cannot hold globally in the superquadratic range. We further establish an almost sharp inequality whose leading constant is arbitrarily close to the Euclidean best constant, and we derive improved inequalities under finitely many orthogonality constraints with respect to sign-changing test families.

AI.tldr: 在闭黎曼流形上建立基于热核的本征分数阶Sobolev框架，研究临界分数阶Sobolev嵌入，确定低阶L^p项的最优系数，证明超二次范围内全局完全尖锐的p-幂不等式不成立，建立几乎尖锐不等式，并在符号变化测试族下推导正交约束下的改进不等式。
AI.motivation: 研究黎曼流形上分数阶Sobolev空间的性质，特别是临界嵌入和最优常数问题，这对于理解流形上的函数空间理论和偏微分方程有重要意义。
AI.method: 基于热核建立本征的分数阶Sobolev框架，使用变分方法和谱理论分析临界分数阶Sobolev嵌入，通过分析最优系数和常数来研究不等式的尖锐性。
AI.result: 确定了低阶L^p项的最优系数，证明了在超二次范围内全局完全尖锐的p-幂不等式不可能成立，建立了几乎尖锐不等式（其主导常数可任意接近欧几里得最佳常数），并在符号变化测试族的正交约束下推导了改进不等式。
AI.conclusion: 在闭黎曼流形上，分数阶Sobolev嵌入的最优常数和不等式尖锐性受到流形几何的约束，虽然不能达到全局完全尖锐性，但可以建立几乎尖锐的近似结果，并通过正交约束获得改进。

title: On the effects of surface roughness in non-isothermal porous medium flow
summary: We analyze a non-isothermal Darcy-Brinkman thin-film flow with a periodically oscillating boundary and viscous dissipation acting as a heat source. Using asymptotic analysis and the periodic unfolding method, we establish the convergence of velocity, pressure, and temperature fields as the small parameter (related to the film thickness and the period of the roughness) tends to zero. The limit problems depend on the relative scaling of the roughness wavelength and consist of coupled elliptic systems combining Reynolds-type equations with Darcy-Brinkman cell problems and reduced energy equation. In the critical roughness regime, the effective model exhibits a strong coupling induced by the oscillatory geometry, which does not occur in a smooth-boundary case.

AI.tldr: 研究非等温Darcy-Brinkman薄层流动，考虑周期性振荡边界和粘性耗散热源，通过渐近分析和周期展开方法建立收敛性，得到依赖粗糙度波长的有效模型
AI.motivation: 研究具有周期性粗糙边界的非等温薄层流动问题，分析边界振荡和粘性耗散热源对流动和传热的影响，建立有效的宏观模型来描述这种复杂耦合现象
AI.method: 采用渐近分析和周期展开方法，通过小参数（薄膜厚度与粗糙度周期之比）趋于零的极限过程，建立速度、压力和温度场的收敛性，推导出依赖粗糙度波长尺度的有效模型
AI.result: 得到了依赖粗糙度波长相对尺度的有效模型，包括Reynolds型方程、Darcy-Brinkman单元问题和简化能量方程的耦合椭圆系统，在临界粗糙度区域中，振荡几何结构导致强耦合效应
AI.conclusion: 周期性粗糙边界在非等温Darcy-Brinkman薄层流动中产生独特的强耦合效应，这种效应在光滑边界情况下不会出现，为复杂几何条件下的流动传热分析提供了理论框架

title: Positivity and long-term behaviour of a diffusion model with measure-valued nonlocal reaction term
summary: The behaviour is investigated of solutions to a diffusion equation on the real line with nonlocal and singular reaction term, i.e., given by a Dirac source or sink at the origin. It gives a simplified representation of for example a control system that senses concentration at a distance, but "intervenes" at the origin. Positivity of solutions (for positive initial conditions) cannot be guaranteed for all parameter settings in the model. We determine a parameter regime and conditions on the positive initial condition in terms of monotonicity and symmetry, that do allow us to conclude the positivity of the solution for all time. In addition, we provide conditions that ensure convergence of the system to a constant steady state (pointwise), outside the region of observation. Technically, we extensively use Laplace transform arguments to achieve these results.

AI.tldr: 研究具有非局部奇异反应项的扩散方程解的行为，该反应项在原点处为狄拉克源或汇，代表远程感知但在原点干预的控制系统。确定了保证解正性和收敛到稳态的参数条件。
AI.motivation: 研究一类具有非局部奇异反应项的扩散方程，这种模型可以简化表示某些控制系统（如远程感知浓度但在原点进行干预的系统）。由于参数设置可能导致解失去正性，需要确定保证解正性的条件。
AI.method: 使用拉普拉斯变换方法，分析在实线上具有狄拉克源/汇反应项的扩散方程。通过参数区域分析和初始条件限制（单调性和对称性条件），研究解的正性和收敛性。
AI.result: 确定了特定的参数区域和初始条件（正性、单调性和对称性），在这些条件下可以保证解对所有时间保持正性。此外，提供了确保系统在观测区域外收敛到常数稳态的条件。
AI.conclusion: 对于具有非局部奇异反应项的扩散方程，通过适当的参数选择和初始条件限制，可以保证解的正性和收敛到稳态。拉普拉斯变换是分析这类问题的有效工具。

title: Continuous in time bubbling and Soliton Resolution for Non-negative Solutions of the Energy-Critical Heat Flow
summary: We show that any finite energy solution of the energy-critical nonlinear heat flow in dimensions $d\geq 3$ asymptotically resolves into a sum of possibly time-dependent solitons, a radiation term, and an error term that vanishes in the energy space. As a consequence, when the initial data has finite energy and is non-negative, we settle the Soliton Resolution Conjecture for all dimensions $d\geq 3.$

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了能量临界非线性热流在d≥3维中的有限能量解会渐近分解为可能随时间变化的孤子、辐射项和能量空间中消失的误差项之和，从而解决了非负初始数据的孤子分解猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究能量临界非线性热流解的渐近行为，特别是验证孤子分解猜想在d≥3维情况下的正确性。该猜想认为非线性发展方程的解在长时间后会分解为孤子、辐射和衰减误差的组合。
AI.method: 分析有限能量解的能量临界非线性热流方程，通过数学分析证明解在长时间演化下会渐近分解为三个部分：可能随时间变化的孤子、辐射项和在能量空间中趋于零的误差项。
AI.result: 证明了对于d≥3维，任何有限能量解都会渐近分解为孤子、辐射和消失误差项之和。特别地，当初始数据有限且非负时，完全解决了孤子分解猜想。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为能量临界非线性热流提供了完整的渐近分解理论，验证了孤子分解猜想在d≥3维情况下的正确性，为理解这类非线性发展方程的长时间行为提供了重要数学基础。

title: The lifespan of strong solutions to the compressible MHD equations with entropy transport in the presence of vacuum
summary: In this paper, we investigate the finite time blow-up of strong solutions to the compressible magnetohydrodynamic (MHD) system (without magnetic diffusion) coupled with entropy transport, and derive an upper bound for the lifespan of such solutions. We first establish the local well-posedness of strong solutions for bounded domains and study the mechanism of finite-time singularity formation in the 2D radially symmetric case and 3D cylindrically symmetric case. We prove that if the initial density vanishes in an interior region containing the origin and the magnetic field is non-trivial within this vacuum region, the strong solution must blow up in finite time. These results generalize and improve the previous results of Huang-Xin-Yan [Math. Ann. 392 (2025) 2365-2394] for the compressible isentropic MHD equations. Significantly, we extend this blow-up result to the free boundary problem. Our analysis of the boundary's expansion allows us to explicitly estimate the maximum lifespan of the solution.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了无磁扩散的可压缩磁流体动力学系统强解的有限时间爆破问题，推导了解的最大寿命上界，并将结果推广到自由边界问题。
AI.motivation: 研究可压缩磁流体动力学系统强解的有限时间爆破机制，特别是当初始密度在包含原点的内部区域为零且磁场在该真空区域非平凡时，强解必然在有限时间内爆破。这推广了先前对可压缩等熵MHD方程的研究结果。
AI.method: 首先建立有界域上强解的局部适定性，然后在2D径向对称和3D柱对称情况下研究奇点形成机制。证明当初始密度在包含原点的内部区域为零且磁场在该真空区域非平凡时，强解必须在有限时间内爆破。分析边界扩展以显式估计解的最大寿命。
AI.result: 证明了在特定初始条件下（初始密度在包含原点的内部区域为零且磁场在该真空区域非平凡），强解必然在有限时间内爆破。将这一爆破结果推广到自由边界问题，并通过分析边界扩展显式估计了解的最大寿命。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功建立了可压缩磁流体动力学系统强解的有限时间爆破理论，推广并改进了先前对可压缩等熵MHD方程的结果，特别是将爆破结果扩展到自由边界问题，并能够显式估计解的最大寿命。

title: Global strong solutions and asymptotic behavior for arbitrarily large initial data of the 2D compressible Navier-Stokes equations with transport entropy
summary: In 1995, Kazhikhov and Vaigant introduced a particular class of isentropic compressible Navier-Stokes equations with variable viscosity coefficients and, for the first time, established the existence of global smooth solutions for arbitrarily large initial data in bounded two-dimensional domains. This result was subsequently extended and refined to accommodate more general constraints on the viscosity coefficients. However, because the proofs in this line of work [17,14,15,8] rely heavily on the structure of the isentropic equations, they could not be generalized to the broader setting of multidimensional compressible heat-conductive Navier-Stokes-Fourier systems. In this paper, we consider a special class of non-isentropic compressible fluids governed by the two-dimensional compressible Navier-Stokes equations with variable entropy. In this system, the pressure depends nonlinearly on both density and entropy, and the entropy evolves solely through a transport equation-a feature that distinguishes it from the standard Navier-Stokes-Fourier model. We establish, for the first time, the global existence of strong solutions for arbitrarily large initial data on both two-dimensional periodic domains and bounded domains endowed with Navier-slip boundary conditions. For the bounded-domain case, a key step in our analysis is the derivation of new commutator estimates compatible with the slip condition. Our results hold even when the initial density may contain vacuum and require no smallness assumption on the initial data, provided the shear viscosity is constant and the bulk viscosity follows a power-law form $λ(ρ)=ρ^β$ with $β> 4/3$. Moreover, we demonstrate that the density remains uniformly bounded for all time. Consequently, the solution converges to an equilibrium state as time tends to infinity.

AI.tldr: 首次证明了二维非等熵可压缩Navier-Stokes方程在任意大初值下的全局强解存在性，无需小性假设，密度可含真空且保持有界，最终收敛到平衡态。
AI.motivation: Kazhikhov和Vaigant在1995年首次证明了二维等熵可压缩Navier-Stokes方程在任意大初值下的全局光滑解存在性，但该证明严重依赖等熵方程的结构，无法推广到更一般的多维可压缩热传导Navier-Stokes-Fourier系统。本文旨在突破这一限制。
AI.method: 研究一类特殊的二维非等熵可压缩流体，其压力非线性依赖于密度和熵，熵仅通过输运方程演化。在周期性区域和有界区域（带Navier-slip边界条件）上建立全局强解存在性。对有界区域情况，推导了与滑移条件兼容的新交换子估计。
AI.result: 首次证明了在剪切粘度为常数、体积粘度满足幂律形式λ(ρ)=ρ^β（β>4/3）的条件下，即使初始密度可能包含真空且无需初值小性假设，也能得到全局强解存在性。密度对所有时间保持一致有界，且解随时间趋于无穷收敛到平衡态。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将Kazhikhov-Vaigant型结果推广到非等熵可压缩Navier-Stokes方程，突破了等熵方程结构的限制，为更一般的可压缩热传导系统研究提供了新思路和方法。

title: Global well-posedness for the generalized intermediate NLS with a nonvanishing condition at infinity
summary: The Intermediate Nonlinear Schrödinger equation models quasi-harmonic internal waves in two-fluid layer system, and admits dark solitons, that is, solutions with nonvanishing boundary conditions at spatial infinity. These solutions fall outside existing well-posedness theories. We establish local and global well-posedness in a Zhidkov-type space naturally suited to such non-trivial boundary conditions, and extend these results to a generalized defocusing equation. This appears to be the first well-posedness result for the equation in a functional setting adapted to its dark soliton structure.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了Intermediate Nonlinear Schrödinger方程在非零边界条件下的适定性理论，首次为暗孤子结构提供了合适的函数空间框架。
AI.motivation: Intermediate Nonlinear Schrödinger方程模拟两层流体系统中的准谐波内波，允许暗孤子解（在空间无穷远处具有非零边界条件）。这些解超出了现有适定性理论的范围，需要建立适合非平凡边界条件的数学框架。
AI.method: 使用Zhidkov型空间（自然适应非零边界条件），建立局部和全局适定性，并将结果推广到广义散焦方程。
AI.result: 首次在适应暗孤子结构的函数设置中获得了该方程的适定性结果，为暗孤子解提供了严格的数学基础。
AI.conclusion: 该研究填补了Intermediate Nonlinear Schrödinger方程在非零边界条件下适定性理论的空白，为暗孤子解的数学分析提供了合适的函数空间框架。

title: On the basin of attraction for the free boundary free elastic flow
summary: The free boundary free elastic flow is the steepest descent gradient flow for the elastic energy of curves meeting parallel lines perpendicularly. In this article we prove that the straight line has, measured in Euler's scale-invariant bending energy, a basin of attraction at least to the level $1.9615\, π$. We show that our method of proof cannot be pushed to the previously conjectured level $2π$, and in addition present numerical evidence that this conjecture may in fact be false.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了自由边界弹性流的稳定性，证明了直线在特定能量水平内具有吸引盆，并质疑了之前关于2π能量水平的猜想。
AI.motivation: 研究自由边界弹性流中直线的稳定性，该流是曲线弹性能量的梯度流，曲线需要垂直地接触平行线。目标是确定直线在何种能量水平下具有吸引盆。
AI.method: 采用理论分析方法证明直线在欧拉尺度不变弯曲能量下的吸引盆至少达到1.9615π水平。同时通过数学论证表明该方法无法扩展到2π水平，并提供了数值证据支持这一结论。
AI.result: 证明了直线在能量水平1.9615π内具有吸引盆，同时发现证明方法无法扩展到2π水平，数值证据表明之前关于2π吸引盆的猜想可能是错误的。
AI.conclusion: 直线在自由边界弹性流中确实具有吸引盆，但其范围可能小于之前猜测的2π水平，约为1.9615π，这挑战了之前的理论猜想。

title: Upper-semicontinuity of uniform attractors for the non-autonomous viscoelastic Kirchhoff plate equation with memory
summary:
This paper delves into the long-time dynamics of a non-autonomous viscoelastic Kirchhoff plate equation with memory effects, described by
  $$
  u_{t t}-Δu_{t t}+a_ε(t) u_t+αΔ^2 u-\int_0^{\infty} μ(s) Δ^2 u(t-s) \mathrm{d} s-Δu_t+f(u)=g(x,t),
  $$
  in bounded domain $Ω\subset \mathbb{R}^N$ with smooth boundary and nonlinear terms. Initially, the global existence of a weak solution that induces a continuous process is established. Subsequently, the existence of a uniform attractor is demonstrated in both subcritical and critical growth scenarios, utilizing operator techniques and an innovative analytical approach. Finally, the upper semicontinuity of the family of uniform attractors as the pert parameterurbation $ε\to 0^+$ is proven through delicate energy estimates and a contradiction argument. Our results not only extend classical attractor theory to more general non-autonomous viscoelastic systems but also resolve open questions regarding the limiting behavior of attractors in the presence of both memory and critical nonlinearity.

AI.tldr: 研究非自治粘弹性Kirchhoff板方程的长时动力学，建立弱解存在性、一致吸引子存在性及其在参数扰动下的上半连续性
AI.motivation: 将经典吸引子理论推广到更一般的非自治粘弹性系统，解决同时存在记忆效应和临界非线性时吸引子极限行为的开放性问题
AI.method: 建立弱解存在性并构造连续过程；在次临界和临界增长情形下利用算子技术和创新分析方法证明一致吸引子存在性；通过精细能量估计和矛盾论证证明吸引子族的上半连续性
AI.result: 证明了弱解全局存在性、一致吸引子存在性（次临界和临界情形），以及当扰动参数ε→0⁺时吸引子族的上半连续性
AI.conclusion: 该研究扩展了经典吸引子理论到更一般的非自治粘弹性系统，解决了记忆效应和临界非线性同时存在时吸引子极限行为的开放性问题

title: Minimizing movements for quasilinear Keller--Segel systems with nonlinear mobility in weighted Wasserstein metrics
summary: We prove the global existence of weak solutions to quasilinear Keller--Segel systems with nonlinear mobility by minimizing movements (JKO scheme) in the product space of the weighted Wasserstein space and $L^2$ space. While minimizing movements for Keller--Segel systems with linear mobility are adapted in the product space of the Wasserstein space and $L^2$ space, due to the nonlinearity of mobility, we need to use the weighted Wasserstein space instead of the Wasserstein space. Moreover, since the mobility function is not Lipschitz, we first find solutions to the Keller--Segel systems whose mobility is apporoximated by a Lipschitz function, and then we establish additional uniform estimates and convergences to derive solutions to the Keller--Segel systems.

AI.tldr: 使用加权Wasserstein空间和L²空间的乘积空间中最小化运动方法，证明了具有非线性迁移率的拟线性Keller-Segel系统弱解的全局存在性
AI.motivation: 研究具有非线性迁移率的Keller-Segel系统，这类系统由于迁移率的非线性特性，无法直接使用传统的Wasserstein空间方法，需要发展新的数学框架来处理
AI.method: 在加权Wasserstein空间和L²空间的乘积空间中应用最小化运动方法（JKO格式），首先通过Lipschitz函数逼近迁移率获得近似解，然后建立一致估计和收敛性证明原系统解的存在性
AI.result: 成功证明了具有非线性迁移率的拟线性Keller-Segel系统弱解的全局存在性，克服了迁移率非Lipschitz和非线性的技术困难
AI.conclusion: 通过引入加权Wasserstein空间和逼近技术，扩展了最小化运动方法在Keller-Segel系统中的应用范围，为处理非线性迁移率问题提供了有效框架

title: Optimal stabilization rate for the wave equation with hyperbolic boundary condition
summary: We show that the energy of classical solutions to the wave equation with hyperbolic boundary condition (i.e., dynamic Wentzell boundary condition) and damping on the boundary decays like 1/t. In fact we allow mixed boundary conditions: a possibly empty, disjoint part of the boundary may be kept at rest provided that the dynamic part satisfies the geometric control condition. We also prove that this decay rate is sharp. Our results follow from resolvent estimates, which we establish by studying high-frequency quasimodes.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了具有双曲边界条件（动态Wentzell边界条件）和边界阻尼的波动方程经典解的能量以1/t速率衰减，且该衰减率是最优的。
AI.motivation: 研究具有动态边界条件和边界阻尼的波动方程的能量衰减行为，探索在混合边界条件下（部分边界固定、部分边界动态）的能量衰减特性。
AI.method: 通过研究高频拟模建立解析估计，利用几何控制条件分析动态边界部分，证明能量衰减率。
AI.result: 证明了能量以1/t速率衰减，且该衰减率是最优的；在动态边界满足几何控制条件下，即使存在部分固定边界，衰减率仍然成立。
AI.conclusion: 具有双曲边界条件和边界阻尼的波动方程能量以最优速率1/t衰减，几何控制条件对确保衰减率至关重要。

title: Existence of positive solutions for a class of almost critical problems on an annulus
summary: In this paper we will consider multi-peaks positive solutions for a class of slightly subcritical or slightly supercritical elliptic problems on an annulus with Dirichlet boundary conditions. By using the explicit form of the Green function and of the Robin function on the annulus, we prove that the annulus becomes thinner and thinner when the number of bumps increases for the slightly subcritical case, while the hole of the annulus is very small for the slightly supercritical case.

AI.tldr: 研究环形区域上略微亚临界或略微超临界椭圆问题的多峰正解，发现亚临界情况下环会随峰数增加而变薄，超临界情况下环的孔洞会变得很小
AI.motivation: 研究环形区域上具有Dirichlet边界条件的椭圆问题，探讨在略微亚临界或略微超临界参数下多峰正解的存在性和几何特性
AI.method: 利用环形区域上Green函数和Robin函数的显式形式，分析多峰正解的存在性和几何性质
AI.result: 在略微亚临界情况下，随着峰数增加环形区域变得越来越薄；在略微超临界情况下，环形区域的孔洞变得非常小
AI.conclusion: 环形区域的几何形状与椭圆问题的临界性参数和多峰解的结构有密切关系，亚临界和超临界情况表现出不同的几何特征

title: Global boundedness of weak solutions with finite energy to a general class of Dirichlet problems
summary: As explained in detail in the prologue to this manuscript, boundedness of weak solutions for general classes of elliptic equations in divergence form is a classic tool for achieving higher regularity. We propose here some global boundedness results under general assumptions that can be applied to several cases studied in the recent and extensive literature on partial differential equations \textit{under general growth}. In particular, we propose the class of \textit{weak solutions with finite energy} in which to search for solutions and in which regularity can be studied and achieved. We emphasize that we are not limited to minimizers of certain integral functionals, as often considered recently in this context of general growth, but to the broader class of weak solutions to Dirichlet problems for general nonlinear elliptic equations in divergence form.

AI.tldr: 提出在一般增长条件下的椭圆方程弱解全局有界性结果，适用于更广泛的弱解类而非仅限于泛函极小化子
AI.motivation: 在散度形式椭圆方程中，弱解的有界性是获得更高正则性的经典工具。最近在一般增长条件下的偏微分方程研究中，需要建立适用于更广泛弱解类的有界性结果，而不仅限于泛函极小化子。
AI.method: 提出"有限能量弱解"类作为研究框架，针对一般非线性椭圆方程的Dirichlet问题，在一般增长条件下建立全局有界性结果
AI.result: 建立了适用于一般增长条件下散度形式椭圆方程的全局有界性结果，这些结果可应用于最近文献中研究的多种情况
AI.conclusion: 所提出的有限能量弱解类为研究一般增长条件下的椭圆方程正则性提供了合适的框架，扩展了现有结果的应用范围，不再局限于泛函极小化子

title: Obstacle problems for the fractional $p$-Laplacian on fractal domains: well-posedness and asymptotics
summary: We study obstacle problems for the regional fractional $p$-Laplacian in a domain $Ω\subset\mathbb{R}^2$ having as fractal boundary the Koch snowflake. We prove well-posedness results for the solution of the obstacle problem, as well as two equivalent formulations. Moreover, we study corresponding approximating obstacle problems in a sequence of domains $Ω_n\subset\mathbb{R}^2$ having as boundary the $n$-th pre-fractal approximation of the Koch snowflake, for $n\in\mathbb{N}$. After proving the well-posedness of the approximating obstacle problems, we perform the asymptotic analysis for both $n\to+\infty$ and $p\to+\infty$.

AI.tldr: 研究科赫雪花分形边界区域上分数阶p-Laplacian障碍问题的适定性和渐近分析
AI.motivation: 研究具有分形边界（科赫雪花）的区域上分数阶p-Laplacian算子的障碍问题，这类问题在分形几何和非局部偏微分方程理论中具有重要意义
AI.method: 1. 在科赫雪花边界区域上建立障碍问题的适定性；2. 提出两种等价表述；3. 在预分形近似区域序列上构造逼近障碍问题；4. 对n→∞（分形逼近）和p→∞（算子极限）进行渐近分析
AI.result: 证明了原始障碍问题和逼近障碍问题的适定性，建立了两种等价表述，并完成了n→∞和p→∞两种极限过程的渐近分析
AI.conclusion: 成功处理了具有分形边界的区域上分数阶p-Laplacian障碍问题，为分形几何与非局部偏微分方程的交叉研究提供了理论框架

title: On the large time behavior of the 2D inhomogeneous incompressible viscous flows
summary: This paper studies the two-dimensional inhomogeneous Navier--Stokes equations governing stratified flows in a bounded domain under a gravitational potential \(f\). Our main results are as follows. First, we provide a rigorous characterization of steady states, proving that under the Dirichlet condition \(\mathbf{u}|_{\partial Ω} = \mathbf{0}\), all admissible equilibria are hydrostatic and satisfy \(\nabla p_s = -ρ_s \nabla f\). Second, through a perturbative analysis around arbitrary hydrostatic profiles, we show that despite possible transient growth induced by the Rayleigh--Taylor mechanism, the system always relaxes to a hydrostatic equilibrium. Third, we identify a necessary and sufficient condition on the initial density perturbation for convergence to a linear hydrostatic density profile of the form \(ρ_s = -γf + β\), with \(γ> 0\) and \(β> 0\). Finally, we establish improved regularity estimates for strong solutions corresponding to initial data in the Sobolev space \(H^3(Ω)\).

AI.tldr: 研究二维非齐次Navier-Stokes方程在有界域中受重力势影响的层流，主要结果包括：稳态的严格特征化、任意静水压剖面附近的扰动分析、收敛到线性密度剖面的充要条件，以及强解的正则性估计。
AI.motivation: 研究受重力势影响的非齐次Navier-Stokes方程在层流中的动力学行为，特别是稳态特征和扰动稳定性，这对于理解分层流体在重力场中的长期行为具有重要意义。
AI.method: 采用严格的数学分析方法，包括稳态特征化、扰动分析、收敛条件识别以及Sobolev空间中的正则性估计，重点研究Dirichlet边界条件下的系统行为。
AI.result: 1. 证明在Dirichlet边界条件下所有可容许稳态都是静水压的；2. 尽管Rayleigh-Taylor机制可能引起瞬态增长，系统总是松弛到静水压平衡；3. 识别了收敛到线性密度剖面的充要条件；4. 建立了H^3初始数据对应强解的改进正则性估计。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为二维非齐次Navier-Stokes方程在有界域中的层流提供了完整的数学理论框架，证明了系统最终总是趋于静水压平衡，并给出了收敛到特定密度剖面的精确条件。

title: An overdetermined problem related to the p-Laplacian on Riemannian manifolds
summary: In this paper, we study the overdetermined problem for the p-Laplacian equation on a compact Riemannian manifold with positive Ricci curvature. By introducing a new P-function which is related to the first nonzero eigenvalue for p-Laplacian, we obtain some integral identities. As their applications, the Heintze-Karcher type inequality and the Soap Bubble Theorem have been achieved.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了正Ricci曲率紧致黎曼流形上的p-Laplacian超定问题，通过引入与p-Laplacian第一非零特征值相关的新P函数，获得积分恒等式，并应用于Heintze-Karcher型不等式和肥皂泡定理。
AI.motivation: 研究紧致黎曼流形上p-Laplacian方程的过定问题，特别是在正Ricci曲率条件下，探索几何不等式和刚性结果。
AI.method: 引入与p-Laplacian第一非零特征值相关的新P函数，建立积分恒等式，并应用于几何分析。
AI.result: 获得了积分恒等式，并推导出Heintze-Karcher型不等式和肥皂泡定理。
AI.conclusion: 通过新P函数方法，成功解决了正Ricci曲率紧致黎曼流形上p-Laplacian的过定问题，获得了重要的几何不等式和刚性结果。

title: The Neumann Green function of the annulus
summary: Using Gegenbauer polynomials and the zonal harmonic functions we build an explicit representation formula for the Green function with Neumann boundary conditions in the annulus.

AI.tldr: 利用Gegenbauer多项式和带调和函数构建了环状区域上Neumann边界条件的Green函数的显式表示公式
AI.motivation: 为环状区域（annulus）上的Neumann边界条件问题提供显式的Green函数表示，解决这类偏微分方程边值问题的解析解构造
AI.method: 使用Gegenbauer多项式和带调和函数（zonal harmonic functions）作为数学工具，通过级数展开方法构建Green函数的显式表达式
AI.result: 成功推导出环状区域上Neumann边界条件的Green函数的显式表示公式，为相关边值问题提供了解析解
AI.conclusion: 提出的方法有效解决了环状区域Neumann边界条件Green函数的构造问题，为相关偏微分方程边值问题提供了新的解析工具

title: Hölder regularity of doubly nonlinear nonlocal quasilinear parabolic equations in some mixed singular-degenerate regime
summary:
We study local Hölder regularity of bounded, weak solutions for the nonlocal quasilinear equations of the form \[ (|u|^{q-2}u)_t + \text{P.V.} \int_{\mathbb{R}^n} \frac{|u(x,t) - u(y,t)|^{p-2}(u(x,t)-u(y,t))}{|x-y|^{n+sp}} dy = 0, \] with $p\in (1,\infty)$, $q\in (1,\infty)$ and $s \in (0,1)$. Analogous Hölder continuity result in the local case is known in the purely singular case $\{1<p<2, p<q\}$, purely degenerate case $\{2<p, q<p\}$, scale invariant case $\{p=q\}$ and translation invariant case $\{q=2,1<p<\infty\}$. In the nonlocal setting, Hölder regularity is known when the equation is either translation invariant $\{q=2, 1<p<\infty\}$ or scale invariant $\{q=p, 1<p<\infty\}$ or purely degenerate case $\{2<p, q<p\}$. Similar strategy can be used to obtain Hölder regularity in the purely singular case $\{1<p<2, p<q\}$.
  In this paper, we adapt several ideas developed over the past few years and combine it with a new intrinsic scaling to prove Hölder regularity in the mixed singular-degenerate range $\max\{p,q,2\} < \min\left\{q + \tfrac{p-1}{1+\frac{n}{sp}}, 2 + \tfrac{p-1}{1+\frac{n}{sp}}\right\}$. The proof explicitly makes use of the nonlocal nature of the problem and as a consequence, our estimates are not stable at $s \rightarrow 0$. We note that the analogous regularity in the local problem remains open.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了非局部拟线性方程弱解的局部Hölder正则性，填补了混合奇异-退化情形下的理论空白。
AI.motivation: 在非局部拟线性方程的正则性研究中，已有结果主要覆盖平移不变、尺度不变和纯退化情形，而混合奇异-退化情形的正则性尚未解决。本文旨在填补这一理论空白。
AI.method: 结合近年发展的技术思想，引入新的内在尺度方法，并充分利用问题的非局部特性来证明Hölder正则性。
AI.result: 成功证明了在混合奇异-退化范围 $\max\{p,q,2\} < \min\left\{q + \tfrac{p-1}{1+\frac{n}{sp}}, 2 + \tfrac{p-1}{1+\frac{n}{sp}}\right\}$ 内，有界弱解具有局部Hölder连续性。
AI.conclusion: 本文首次在非局部拟线性方程的混合奇异-退化情形下建立了Hölder正则性理论，该结果依赖于问题的非局部特性，且相应的局部问题正则性仍然开放。

title: A critical threshold for the cosmological Euler-Poisson system
summary: We consider the gravitational Euler-Poisson system with a linear equation of state on an expanding cosmological model of the Universe. The expansion of the spatial sections introduces an additional dissipating effect in the Euler equation. We prescribe the expansion rate of space by a scale factor $a(t)=t^α$ with $α\in(0,1)$, which describes the growth of length scales over time. This model is regularly applied in cosmology to study classical fluids in an expanding Universe. We study the behaviour of solutions to this system arising from small, near-homogeneous initial data and discover a \emph{critical} change of behaviour near the expansion rate $α=2/3$, which corresponds to the matter-dominated regime in cosmology. In particular, we prove that for $α>2/3$ the fluid variables are global in time and remain small provided they are sufficiently small in a suitable norm initially. In the complementary regime $α\leq2/3$, we present numerical evidence for shock formation of solutions to the Euler equation for arbitrarily small initial data. In combination, this establishes the existence of a critical stability threshold for barotropic fluids in expanding domains. In contrast to our previous work on the corresponding relativistic system, the threshold in the classical system considered here is independent of the speed of sound of the fluid. This establishes that fluids in cosmology behave fundamentally different in the non-relativistic regime than in the relativistic one.

AI.tldr: 研究膨胀宇宙中欧拉-泊松系统的稳定性阈值：当膨胀率α>2/3时解全局存在且保持小扰动，α≤2/3时即使初始扰动任意小也会形成激波，揭示了经典流体与相对论性流体的根本差异。
AI.motivation: 研究膨胀宇宙中经典流体的稳定性行为，探索空间膨胀对流体动力学的影响，特别是寻找临界稳定性阈值，并与相对论性系统进行对比。
AI.method: 使用线性状态方程的引力欧拉-泊松系统，设定空间膨胀率a(t)=t^α（α∈(0,1)），分析小扰动初始条件下解的长期行为。结合数学证明（α>2/3时的全局存在性）和数值模拟（α≤2/3时的激波形成）。
AI.result: 发现临界膨胀率α=2/3：当α>2/3时，流体变量全局存在且保持小扰动；当α≤2/3时，即使初始扰动任意小也会形成激波。该阈值与流体声速无关，与相对论性系统形成鲜明对比。
AI.conclusion: 膨胀宇宙中的经典流体存在临界稳定性阈值α=2/3，该阈值独立于流体声速，表明经典流体与相对论性流体在宇宙学中的行为存在根本性差异。

title: Computing multiple solutions from knowledge of the critical set
summary:
{We explore a simple {\it geometric model} for functions between spaces of the same dimension (in infinite dimensions, we require that Jacobians be Fredholm operators of index zero). The model combines standard results in analysis and topology associated with familiar global and local aspects. Functions are supposed to be proper on bounded sets. The model is valid for a large class of semilinear elliptic differential operators.
  It also provides a fruitful context for numerical analysis. 
  For a function $F: X \to Y$ between real Banach spaces, continuation methods to solve $F(x) = y$ may improve from considerations about the global geometry of $F$.
  We consider three classes of examples. First we handle functions from the Euclidean plane to itself, for which the reasoning behind the techniques is visualizable. The second, between spaces of dimension 15, is obtained by discretizing a nonlinear Sturm-Liouville problem for which special right hand sides admit abundant solutions. Finally, we compute the six solutions of a semilinear elliptic equation $-Δu - f(u) = g$ studied by Solimini.}

AI.tldr: 提出一个几何模型用于分析同维空间之间的函数映射，结合分析和拓扑方法，适用于一大类半线性椭圆微分算子，并为数值分析提供框架。
AI.motivation: 研究函数在同维空间之间的几何性质，为求解方程F(x)=y的延拓方法提供几何视角，特别适用于半线性椭圆微分算子。
AI.method: 建立几何模型，要求函数在有界集上是proper的，在无限维情况下要求雅可比是零指标Fredholm算子。结合分析和拓扑的标准结果，考虑函数的全局和局部性质。
AI.result: 模型适用于一大类半线性椭圆微分算子，为数值分析提供有效框架。通过三个例子验证：二维欧几里得平面映射、15维空间的非线性Sturm-Liouville问题离散化、Solimini研究的半线性椭圆方程六解计算。
AI.conclusion: 几何模型为分析同维空间函数映射提供了统一框架，特别适用于半线性椭圆问题，能改进求解方程的延拓方法，并在数值计算中展现应用价值。

title: Well-posedness and long time dynamics for a quasi-geostrophic ocean-atmosphere model with radiation balance
summary: We investigate a coupled atmosphere-ocean model including the mechanical and thermodynamical interaction between the two fluids for the mid-latitudes. The formulation combines a multilayer quasi-geostrophic dynamical framework with temperature equations incorporating long- and short-wave radiative forcing, as in energy balance models. Within a suitable functional framework, we establish the existence and uniqueness of solutions, and their continuous dependence on the radiation parameters. We also prove that the long-time dynamics are described by a finite-dimensional global attractor and, moreover, that the system possesses a finite set of determining modes that governs its asymptotic behaviour. In particular, we show that the long-term evolution of the ocean's temperature can be reconstructed solely from observations of the velocity fields across the model's layers.

AI.tldr: 该论文建立了一个包含机械和热力学相互作用的中纬度大气-海洋耦合模型，证明了解的存在唯一性、连续依赖性，并分析了系统的长期动力学特性。
AI.motivation: 研究中纬度大气-海洋系统的相互作用，特别是机械和热力学耦合效应，这对于理解气候系统的长期行为至关重要。
AI.method: 采用多层准地转动力学框架，结合包含长短波辐射强迫的温度方程（类似能量平衡模型），在合适的函数空间中建立数学模型。
AI.result: 证明了系统解的存在唯一性、对辐射参数的连续依赖性，长期动力学由有限维全局吸引子描述，且系统具有有限个决定模式控制渐近行为。
AI.conclusion: 该耦合模型具有良好数学性质，海洋温度的长期演化仅通过观测各层速度场即可重建，为气候系统研究提供了理论框架。

title: Schr{ö}dinger maps to a K{ä}hler manifold in two dimensions
summary: We prove a global well--posedness and scattering result for Schr{ö}dinger maps to a general K{ä}hler manifold with small initial data in a Besov space.

AI.tldr: 证明了Schrödinger映射到一般Kähler流形在Besov空间中具有小初值时的全局适定性和散射结果
AI.motivation: 研究Schrödinger映射到一般Kähler流形的全局适定性和散射问题，扩展小初值条件下的理论结果
AI.method: 使用Besov空间框架，分析Schrödinger映射到一般Kähler流形的小初值问题，证明全局适定性和散射性质
AI.result: 证明了在Besov空间中具有小初值时，Schrödinger映射到一般Kähler流形存在全局适定解，并且该解具有散射性质
AI.conclusion: 对于一般Kähler流形上的Schrödinger映射，在Besov空间中的小初值条件下，可以获得全局适定性和散射结果

title: Ground state solutions to the nonlinear Born-Infeld problem
summary:
In the paper we show the existence of ground state solutions to the nonlinear Born-Infeld problem \[ \mathrm{div}\, \left(  rac{
abla u}{\sqrt{1-|
abla u|^2}} ight) + f(u) = 0, \quad x \in \mathbb{R}^N \] in the zero and positive mass cases. Moreover, we find a new proof of the Sobolev-type inequality \[ \int_{\mathbb{R}^N} \left(1 - \sqrt{1-|
abla u|^2}ight) \, dx \geq C_{N,p} \left( \int_{\mathbb{R}^N} |u|^p \, dx ight)^{ rac{N}{N+p}}, \] for $p > 2^*$ as well as the characterization of the optimal constant $C_{N,p}$ in terms of the ground state energy level. Previous approaches relied on approximation schemes and/or symmetry assumptions, which typically yield to compact embeddings and may lead to solutions that are not at the ground state energy level. In contrast, neither approximation arguments nor symmetry assumptions are employed in the paper to obtain a ground state solution. Instead, we develop a new direct variational approach based on minimization over a Pohožaev manifold combined with profile decomposition techniques. Finally, we show that nonradial solutions exist whenever $N \geq 4$; in particular, this settles a previously open problem in the case $N=5$.

AI.tldr: 论文证明了非线性Born-Infeld问题在零质量和正质量情况下基态解的存在性，提出了Sobolev型不等式的新证明，并发展了基于Pohožaev流形和profile分解技术的直接变分方法。
AI.motivation: 研究非线性Born-Infeld方程的基态解存在性问题。传统方法依赖近似方案和对称性假设，可能导致解不在基态能级。需要开发新的直接变分方法来获得真正的基态解。
AI.method: 提出新的直接变分方法：结合Pohožaev流形的最小化和profile分解技术。不使用近似论证或对称性假设，直接处理原问题。
AI.result: 1. 证明了零质量和正质量情况下Born-Infeld问题基态解的存在性；2. 给出了Sobolev型不等式的新证明和最优常数的特征化；3. 证明了当N≥4时存在非径向解，特别解决了N=5时的开放问题。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了Born-Infeld问题基态解的存在性理论，发展了不依赖对称性假设的直接变分方法，解决了相关开放问题，为这类非线性问题提供了新的分析框架。

title: The Lorentzian Calderón problem on vector bundles
summary: In this paper we study a Lorentzian version of the Calderón problem, which is concerned with the determination of a connection and potential on a Hermitian vector bundle over a Lorentzian manifold from the Dirichlet-to-Neumann map of the associated connection wave operator. For a class of Lorentzian manifolds satisfying a curvature bound, including perturbations of Minkowski space over strictly convex domains, the connection and potential is shown to be uniquely determined up to the natural gauge transformations of the problem. The proof is based on ideas from the earlier works arXiv:2008.07508, arXiv:2112.01663 of the second author in the scalar setting.

AI.tldr: 研究洛伦兹流形上Calderón问题的推广，通过Dirichlet-to-Neumann映射确定向量丛上的联络和势能，在满足曲率限制的流形类中证明唯一性（除规范变换外）。
AI.motivation: 将经典的Calderón问题（通过边界测量确定内部电导率）推广到洛伦兹几何背景，研究波动方程算子的逆问题，在广义相对论和波传播理论中有应用。
AI.method: 基于作者先前在arXiv:2008.07508和arXiv:2112.01663中的标量场工作，将方法扩展到向量丛情形，考虑满足特定曲率限制的洛伦兹流形类（包括闵可夫斯基空间的扰动）。
AI.result: 对于满足曲率限制的洛伦兹流形类（包括严格凸域上的闵可夫斯基空间扰动），联络和势能可由Dirichlet-to-Neumann映射唯一确定（除规范变换外）。
AI.conclusion: 成功将Calderón问题推广到洛伦兹几何背景，建立了向量丛上联络和势能通过边界测量的唯一确定性，为洛伦兹流形上的逆问题理论提供了重要结果。

title: Global bifurcation of hollow vortex streets
summary: Vortex streets are periodic configurations of vortices propagating through an irrotational flow. In this paper, we study streets of hollow vortices, which are solutions to the free boundary $2$-d irrotational incompressible Euler equations. Each vortex core is a region of constant pressure in the complement of the fluid domain with a nonzero circulation around it. We prove that any non-degenerate singly-periodic point vortex configuration can be ``desingularized'' to create a global curve of solutions to the steady hollow vortex street problem, and we further characterize the types of singular behavior that can develop as one transverses the curve to its extreme. As specific examples, we study von Kármán vortex streets, translating vortex arrays, and a two-pair (2P) configuration. Our method is based on analytic global bifurcation theory and adapts the desingularization technique of Chen, Walsh, and Wheeler to the periodic setting.
